europeana:record.dc:title: Notes on Spanish non-marine molluscs : 3. Chondrinidae from the Cantabrian Mountains (Gastropoda: Pulmonata)*
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Raven J.G.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Mollusca
Chondrinidae; taxonomy; Chondrina kobeltoides cliendentata comb. nov.; distribution; NW Spain
europeana:record.dc:description: A review is given of the distribution of Chondrinidae species in the Cantabrian Mountains. Few species occur in that area, Chondrina kobeltoides being the only endemic. Chondrina kobelti and C. kobeltoides are discussed and their characters are compared in a table. The taxon cliendentata is considered to be a subspecies of C. kobeltoides and not of C. kobelti as which it was originally described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Notes on Spanish non-marine molluscs : 3. Chondrinidae from the Cantabrian Mountains (Gastropoda: Pulmonata)* (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 60) (Issue 2)
